title: Question 17
prompt: When Sula hears what Hannah says, what does her reaction show about her character?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
When Sula hears her mother say that she doesn’t like Sula, Sula runs up the stairs, stunned, on the verge of tears. She wouldn’t react this way if she didn’t care what her mother thought. She must care what her mother thinks of her.


“She only heard Hannah’s words, and the pronouncement sent her flying up the stairs.In bewilderment, she stood at the window fingering the curtain edge, aware of a sting in her eye. Nel’s call floated up and into the window, pulling her away from dark thoughts back into the bright, hot daylight.”
